# Signal Illumination 19mm Red and Signal Illumination 19mm Green

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number (#)_Déclaration de numberingR**: PW-22-01014757
* **Amendment Number (#)_Modification numberingR**: 2
* **Solicitation Number (#)_Demande numberingR**: W8486-217777/A

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services ( *GD*)

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking quotations for Signal Illumination 19mm Red and Signal Illumination 19mm Green items. This requirement includes the option to purchase additional units at any time before the contract expires. Mandatory requirements, deliverable information, and payment details are provided in the solicitation package under Annex A and Annex B. The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Controlled Goods Program. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
